headline: JPMorgan Reinstates Palo Alto Networks (PANW) With Overweight Rating
summary: Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (NASDAQ:PANW) is included among the 12 Best Long Term US Stocks to Buy Now. On December 17, JPMorgan reinstated coverage of Palo Alto Networks, Inc. headline: Microsoft, Google rule AI vendor market for enterprises
summary: The two tech titans provide the most advanced offerings for businesses, according to a Gartner analysis. The firm also highlighted OpenAI’s strength as an LLM provider.
